## Policy.cant() method

To call when policy cant auth the action

**Signature:**


## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  dontThrow | boolean | _(Optional)_ Return false instead of throw an error |

**Returns:**

## Exceptions
